show.name: The NeuralNoise Podcast
show.about: A podcast about the future of AI and the impact it will have on our lives. We discuss interesting topics in AI and technology.

speaker1.name: Zach
speaker1.about: Zach is a software engineer and the founder of NeuralNoise.

speaker2.name: Emily
speaker2.about: Emily is the co-host of NeuralNoise and a product designer.
